body: I think the series is incomplete without a one on one scene between Kazuhiko san and Rie san....Woukd have loved to see it happen....I hope Freehand tamashii draws that scene

Bro this is one of the best hentai/hentai series I’ve seen. I love how long it is and how it’s all connected. You’d think I’d hate the art style but it’s got this charm to it so I love the art style. 100/10 very few hentai to get such praise from me. Absolute masterpiece. I hate how my mans just vanished outta nowhere. He was a great artist
